title: The commercial galas so constructed and available with MCGM, will be first allocated to existing licensed vendors certified by Market Department, second to PAPs of vital public purpose projects, third to new licensees as per policy decided by the MCGM
clause_text: The commercial galas so constructed and available with MCGM, will be first allocated to existing licensed vendors certified by Market Department, second to PAPs of vital public purpose projects, third to new licensees as per policy decided by the MCGM. Separate access for the market area and other development shall be provided.
section: 33(21) Development and Redevelopment of Municipal Market/Public Amenities by MCGM/Government

source_pdf.text_snippet: The commercial galas so constructed and available with MCGM, will be first allocated to existing licensed vendors certified by Market Department, second to PAPs of vital public purpose projects, third
